preqs: Twelve credit points of first-year Arts units.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {COM3423, GSC3402%, GSC3423%}

For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do ((Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {COM1020%, GSC1901%} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {COM1010%, GSC1402%}) OR  (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1277, ATS1279} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1278, ATS1280})) Otherwise (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1277} OR  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1278, ATS1279} OR  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1280})
Unit was previously coded {COM2423, GSC3402%, GSC3423%}

description: This unit addresses the key issues of: media audiences and audience activity; the relations between media, citizenship and community; and the impact of new communication technologies. Most importantly, it makes available to you the techniques and theoretical frameworks for researching and analysing audience activity and interactivity. It also helps you learn how these frameworks can be deployed in research design. The unit is organized in three blocks: ways of being an audience, ways of theorizing audiences, and ways of researching audiences.
